title: Best Buy Week 1 Holiday Doorbuster: Save $710 on Lenovo’s RTX 5070 Legion 7i OLED gaming laptop
description: As part of its now live 3-Day sale event, Best Buy is offering a bunch of new Doorbuster deals to deliver fresh lows on Apple gear, Smart TVs, and more. It’s also offering Lenovo’s Legion 7i OLED gaming laptop with an RTX 5070 GPU for $1,599.99 shipped. This …
